    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEdge(Network.Edge edge)
      Inserts an edge into the network.
      void finalise()
      This method converts all inefficient objects in the network to their more efficient equivalents
      For instance, it converts all ArrayLists used in the creation of the Network into Arrays.
      Network.Edge getEdge(int edgeId)
      Gets the edge.
      void getStatus()
      Prints out the status of the network to the main output terminal.

      • getEdge

        Gets the edge.
        Parameters:
        edgeId - the edge id
        Returns:

      • finalise

        public void finalise()
        This method converts all inefficient objects in the network to their more efficient equivalents
        For instance, it converts all ArrayLists used in the creation of the Network into Arrays.
